item.title: The Making of a Burrito
item.description: A couple of years ago a new take-away moved into what used to be a dental practice directly beneath the platform of a Docklands Light Railway station. The establishment called itself “Tortilla” – a fitting, if somewhat unimaginative name for a place that sells burritos. Given that it was just next door to where I used to work at the time, it didn’t take me – a long-time chilli con carne buff – to become a regular.
